p.s: The article Globalised Environmental Pollution - Causes and Effects by Ankita Mitra published at February 5, 2014 is about the pollution of the earth.
To understand the text easily, Ankita Mitra used a clear structure.
At the beginning of the text, she describes the problems of the pollution of the world.
She also does this in the middle of the text (l. 10-35).

At the end of the text, Ankita Mitra wants to convince people to do something against the environmental pollution If we fail to restore the ecological balance right now, it would be too late tomorrow (l. 39-40).
Ankita Mitra uses also inside pronomspronouns.
For example We all live on planet earth (l. 4), Almost all of our gains in the fields of industrial progress, ... (l. 16-17).
With that, she wants to talk and to reach the readers of the article.
In the text you can find many different adjetivesadjectives devastating (l. 15), surge (l. 11), hazardous (l. 2) and indiscriminate (l. 24).
With these adjectives she emphazisesemphasizes that the earth and the people are all in danger.
Besides, she wants to inform the people how big the struggle is.
At the end of the text, she also gives and example in which city the struggle of environmental pollution is.
On December 3, 1984 2000 people including womanwomen and children were killed in Bhopal (l. 32-35).
In addition, hundreds were hurt.
With that example, she wants to inform people again, how fast the development of environmental pollution is.
In the text you can find many different stylistic devices, which emphazisesemphasizes this.
For example, there is an anaphora (l. 6).
With that the author increased the problem of environment pollution.
In line 39-40 you can find ana hyperbole.
If we fail to restore the ecological balance right now, it would be too late tomorrow.
With that the author wants to convince the poeple again, that we have no time to think about it.
She wants, that we have to handle now.
In line 18 you can find a simile.
flora and fauna.
Also in line 7 and 15 you can find two enumirationsenumerations.
With these enumirationsenumerations, the author emphazisesemphasizes her opinion agian.
To conclude, you can say that the author uses the stylistic devices, to show that the environmental pollution is a big problem, and that we have nearly to do something against it.
